name: Beach Volleyball (itch)
description:
Beach volleyball game with minimalistic graphics (otherwise known as, "I can't draw so I'm just going to use boxes to represent things")

This is an entry to the I can't draw but want to make a game (again) game jam.

How to Play

Arrow Keys : for moving your player

C key : Your main attack. Press to  serve / spike the ball

X key : Your defense / pass key. Hold key to receive / pass the ball to teammate

(Tips : Play around with timing to figure out when is the optimal time to hit / pass the ball)

License

Free assets were used for the game. 

Mainly music.
